title: Tom Arnold And Jill Sobule: Nostalgia Kills
description: Ask Me Another relives the 1990s with two special guests: Comedian Tom Arnold discusses his early job at a meatpacking plant, breaking into comedy, and his new Viceland series. Then, singer-songwriter Jill Sobule joins Jonathan Coulton to perform a music parody game.

itunes:summary: Comedian Tom Arnold and singer-songwriter Jill Sobule discuss their early careers and more recent projects.
